data.title: Who is Christina Trevanion's husband Aaron Dean and how many children do they have?
data.meta_description: CHRISTINA Trevanion is best known from presenting TV shows about antiques, but behind the scenes she’s also a married mother-of-two.Here’s everyth
data.text:
CHRISTINA Trevanion is best known from presenting TV shows about antiques, but behind the scenes she’s also a married mother-of-two.

Here’s everything we know about her husband Aaron Dean and their children.

Who is Christina Trevanion's husband Aaron Dean?

Christina Trevanion keeps her personal life private, so very little is known about her husband.

We know the 43-year-old met her husband Aaron Dean while he was studying Fine Arts Valuation at Southampton Solent University.

After graduating in 2002, Aaron spent a decade working as an auctioneer at Gorringe’s antique auctions in Lewes, Sussex.

Aaron made the move to television in 2013, as a valuer and researcher on BBC show Flog It!

In 2014, Christina and Aaron set up Trevanion & Dean, an auction house in Shropshire.

Christina took on sole ownership of the joint venture in 2019 after Aaron left after five years, joining Adam Partridge Auctioneers in 2021.

At the time of his departure, Aaron said: “I am delighted that Christina is now taking over the business.

“I’m excited to see it thrive under her leadership.

“I’ve had a fantastic four years at Trevanion and Dean, full of laughter and fun, and it's time for me to move on”, he explained.

The business is now known as Trevanion Auctioneers and Valuers and is located in Whitchurch, near the Cheshire border.

Since June 2023, Aaron has held a position at the Manchester Art Gallery.

Despite keeping family life private, the Bargain Hunt presenter did give an insight into her family life this month just before Christmas in 2021, when she joked about divorce on X/Twitter.

Christina tweeted: "Has anyone ever cited 'putting up Christmas lights' on divorce papers? Asking for a friend/current husband."

When did Christina Trevanion and her husband Aaron Dean marry?

According to Christina's X/Twitter account, the pair tied the knot on New Year’s Eve in 2010.

Christina wore a wedding dress by Jenny Packham, the designer loved by Princess Kate.

She was walked down the aisle by her father, David, who sadly died in 2013.

There is little else known about the wedding, as although Christina is on Instagram, her account is mostly dedicated to her professional work.

How many children do Christina Trevanion and Aaron Dean have?

Christina and her husband share two daughters together.

She rarely shares any information on her family so it isn't known what the children are called or how old they are.

But Christina did reveal that she was keeping her young children well away from her antiques.

Speaking to Antique Collecting back in 2016, Christina was discussing her favourite pieces at home, explaining that she has "an eclectic mix" of antiques that she’s accumulated over the years.

She explained, "[I have] an eclectic mix of inherited family pieces and treasured saleroom purchases, I have two small children and so my 18th-century teapot collection was packed away until they get a little older!"
